text: Salah Jadid (1926 - 19 August 1993, ) was a Syrian general and ultra-left-wing political figure in the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party in Syria, and the country's de facto leader from 1966 until 1970, when he was ousted by Hafez al-Assad's Corrective Movement. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Syrian politicians
title: Salah Jadid
